title: Would You Listen to My Request?
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Hmm, it’s good.... It’s really good, Umi-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>What is so good?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>The sight of you wearing a Hakama. The fact that you’re holding a bow is also good. As I thought, uniforms shine the most when they are complemented with another item.... Ah, can you turn to your side. I want to take some photos for documentation<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>What are you on about. So you don’t have an interest in archery?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I do! Very much so! It’s a different dignified look from the Hakama that Nozomi-san lent me, and it looks so great! Maaan~, I got to see something so nice. Thank you, Umi-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>....Would you also listen to my request then?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>If it’s something I can do, of course! What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>How about you experience some archery, You? I’m sure the sight of you pulling a bow would also be beautiful<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Eh? No, that’s not something that I can just do right away....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I’ll teach you from the beginning. Come, let’s give it a try!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
